articles.title: Canelo Alvarez will earn at least £30m from Caleb Plant bout as fight purses are revealed - Daily Mail
articles.description: Canelo Alvarez defeated Caleb Plant to become the undisputed super middleweight champion. And in doing so, the pound-for-pound king will earn at least £30m, with Plant taking £7.4m.
articles.content:
Pound-for-pound king Canelo Alvarez is set to receive a minimum of £30million following his emphatic victory over Caleb Plant in Las Vegas. 
The Mexican furthered his status as the sport's very best… [+3228 chars]
